    ["education", "low", "High school completion and current college enrollment indicates positive social integration"],
    ["employment", "medium", "Having only one job in the past year suggests employment instability"],

    ["living situation", "medium", "Living alone may indicate limited social support system"],

risk_factors: Being 22 years old falls in a high-risk age group for recidivism
Two prior arrests shows established criminal history but not extensive
High school completion and current college enrollment indicates positive social integration
Having only one job in the past year suggests employment instability
Four years drug-free demonstrates sustained behavioral control
Living alone may indicate limited social support system
Non-traditional childhood living arrangement may have impacted development
No recent depression indicates current psychological stability
Religious views alone are not strongly predictive of recidivism

prompt.system:
You are a highly experienced criminal justice risk assessment expert
employing advanced statistical and judicial knowledge.
prompt.user:
You are a criminal risk assessment expert. Step back, take a deep breath and carefully think step by step to assign a relative weight [low, medium, high] to each risk factor before using them to collectively predict 3-year rearrest recidivism:
The person is a 22-year-old male who identifies himself as White. He has been arrested 2 times and has been convicted. He is 6 feet 3 inches and weighs 190 lbs. He has never been married and is currently living alone. He has a high school diploma and is enrolled in a 2-year college. He has held 1 job during the year. He has not used any drugs in the past four years and has not felt depressed over the past month. At a young age, he lived with adults other than biological, foster or adoptive parents in a household of size 4, in an urban area. He considers that God has nothing to do with what happens to him personally.

After your analysis, you must respond ONLY with a JSON object in exactly this format, with no additional text:

{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("factor1", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ("factor2", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ...
  ],
  "prediction": "YES" or "NO",
  "confidence": number between 0 and 100
}
